name: Head Up
description:
You can move left and right

If you press "space" your head will jump

If you press "space" as a head you will stick your tongue out

If you hit an enemy with your tongue you'll jump

You need to go to the victory flag and "eat" it!

Enjoy

Game made for the ExtraCredits Game Jam 5 

https://itch.io/jam/exra-credits-game-jam-5/rate/474310

Game made by one guy in 3days - Consult credits screen

Please leave a comment! :D Have fun
